app.name: gridX Health Check
app.short_description: Runs Health Checks on a gridBox
app.long_description: To help diagnose issues with gridBoxes, you can run checks on any gridBox identified by its serial number. New checks will be made available continuously
app.installation_instructions: Configure the following app settings, then click Install:...
app.title: gridX Health Check

serial.label: Gateway S/N
serial.invalid: Gateway S/N must be a valid gridBox serial number
